<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/92c098d18e435a7a762409744ebe2dbb3746ed77|patch 8.2.0828: Travis: regexp patttern doesn't work everywhere>
patch 8.2.0828: Travis: regexp patttern doesn't work everywhere

Problem:    Travis: regexp patttern doesn't work everywhere.
Solution:   Use [:blank:] instead of \b. (Ozaki Kiichi, closes #6146)

attachments.title: patch 8.2.0828: Travis: regexp patttern doesn't work everywhere · vim/vim@92c098d
attachments.text: Problem: Travis: regexp patttern doesn't work everywhere. Solution: Use [:blank:] instead of \b. (Ozaki Kiichi, closes #6146)

patch 8.2.0829: filter() may give misleading error message

Problem:    filter() may give misleading error message.
Solution:   Also mention Blob as an allowed argument.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/80a20df86a1ceefa3506cc578ba0ba35da979e38|patch 8.2.0830: Motif: can't map "!">
patch 8.2.0830: Motif: can't map "!"

Problem:    Motif: can't map "!". (Ben Jackson)
Solution:   Remove the shift modifier if it's already included in the key.
            (closes #6147)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0830: Motif: can't map "!" · vim/vim@80a20df
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0830: Motif: can't map "!" · vim/vim@80a20df
attachments.text: Problem: Motif: can't map "!". (Ben Jackson) Solution: Remove the shift modifier if it's already included in the key. (closes #6147)
